paper.title: Recursion in text and its use in language generation

author.org: Dept. of Computer Science, Columbia University, New York, NY#TAB#

paper.publisher: Department of Computer Science, Columbia University
paper.abstract: In this paper, I show how textual structure is recursive in nature; that is, the same rhetorical strategies that are available for constructing the textu0027s macro-structure are available for constructing its sub-sequences as well, resulting in a hierarchically structured text. The recursive formalism presented can be used by a generation system to vary the amount of detail it presents for the same discourse goal in different situations.
